title: 71: OBITCH let the dead rest...
description:
Oh Geoffs, sweet sweet Geoffs, welcome to our most chaotic episode to date. Sit back and just take it all in as we discuss some more wild instances of posthumous execution, and some funeral reenactments that had us absolutely spinning in our coffins! We’ve got an obituary for one original gal, and one who’s author was a little self-involved. OH and of course, we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminalllllls! 


New episodes come out every Thursday for free, with 1-week early access for Wondery+ subscribers.


Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram @obitchuarypodcast on TikTok


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:

https://www.ocphs.org/the-governor-moses-wisner-house/

https://www.nga.org/governor/moses-wisner/

https://patch.com/michigan/westbloomfield/victorian-funeral-reenactment-for-moses-wisner-150th-anniversary

https://www.oklahoman.com/story/news/1999/10/21/texans-to-revisit-1895-funeral-re-enactors-ask-atoka-man-to-lend-horse-drawn-hearse/62224375007/

https://www.vice.com/en/article/vbnm34/the-princess-diana-funeral-reenactment-was-as-odd-as-it-sounds

https://www.dailystar.co.uk/news/latest-news/princess-diana-death-crash-funeral-16881390

http://visuals.sj-r.com/lincoln-funeral-reenactment-sunday-may-3-2015/

https://www.upi.com/Top_News/US/2015/05/02/President-Lincolns-Illinois-funeral-recreated-on-150th-anniversary/8931430603365/

https://www.breitbart.com/news/president-lincolns-illinois-funeral-recreated-on-150th-anniversary/

https://www.joincake.com/blog/where-is-abraham-lincoln-buried/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Funeral_and_burial_of_Abraham_Lincoln

https://www.channel3000.com/kay-a-heggestad/pic/334178/

https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/couple-planned-wedding-florida-mansion-no-one-told-owner-n1264962

https://nypost.com/2021/04/21/florida-couple-invites-wedding-guests-to-home-that-isnt-theirs/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harold_Harefoot

https://www.royal.uk/harold-harefoot-r-1035-1040

https://www.englishmonarchs.co.uk/vikings_3.htm

https://www.britannica.com/biography/Simon-de-Montfort-earl-of-Leicester

https://www.historyhit.com/facts-about-simon-de-montfort/

https://www.history.com/this-day-in-history/blackbeard-killed-off-north-carolina

https://allthatsinteresting.com/rasputin-penis
